name: places/ChIJVcHjfONYwokRsJ8ck0LxTEg
formattedAddress: Brookfield Place, 200 Vesey St, New York, NY 10281, USA
adrFormatAddress: Brookfield Place, 200 Vesey St, New York, NY 10281, USA

originalText.text:
Not impressed. They treated my disabled husband horribly. He was a lawyer there. They fired him because of his disability and then, according to Sheryl Hanley, deleted all his employment files. I asked for them. She said:

"Most items would not be in a document form and emails generally are not retained on our system beyond the retention term."

He died a few months after he was fired, due to his disability, leaving a wife and three children behind with no support whatsoever.
